about_the_game:
overview

Sibir is an intense survival exploration game set in the unforgiving depths of an abandoned Soviet bunker. You must navigate through the harsh environment, battling extreme temperatures and dwindling resources. Your primary goal is to complete the government issued tasks. Every step you take could be your last.

Key Features

resource Management:

Manage your health, warmth, and stamina as you scavenge for supplies to keep yourself alive.

Crafting and Building: Utilize materials found in the environment to craft tools to protect yourself from the elements and wildlife.

Exploration and Discovery: Traverse diverse areas, uncovering secrets and clues.

Realistic Survival Mechanics: Monitor your temperature, be wary of smoke and hypothermia as you struggle to stay alive.

Multiplayer Mode: Team up with friends or other players in cooperative multiplayer mode to increase your chances of survival.

Prepare yourself for the ultimate test of survival in Sibir.

Can you withstand the elements and make it out alive, or will the bunker consume you?

The adventure starts now...
